input.sentences: the woman was enjoying the view on her vacation .
this young boy trained his bird to do tricks . it was quite a sight .
this view of the mountains was breathtaking .
they were enjoying the nice weather outside .
the man wanted a picture of himself before the trip ended .
output.sentences: Karen had no expectations when she started her road trip
Along the way she came across a falconer boy with a new baby Falcon
With little experience and low resources, Karen began to lose focus with her surroundings
She thought maybe someone had given her a drug as everyone around her was dancing in a ritualistic style
Finally, she felt a sense of relief when she saw Brandon approach from the distance
